name: S P A C E (FinnishTomato)
description:
A short demo made for the HetaLove game jam in February 2018.

Centred around Tino (Finland) and Eduard (Estonia). It's platonic love, it's a friendship that will never fail... Or will it?

Hetalia belongs to Himaruya Hidekaz and credits are in the corresponding text file.

*I forgot to credit Sithjester for making the sprites! (Tino and Eduard) I edited Eduard a bit though.

Updates will come, and this is a very short demo. (Please follow this game!)

Download the RTP for RPG Vx Ace here: http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages
